verses.name: Acts 16:9
verses.text: And a vision appeared to Paul in the night; There stood a man of Macedonia, and prayed him, saying, Come over into Macedonia, and help us.

verses.name: Acts 16:10
verses.text: And after he had seen the vision, immediately we endeavoured to go into Macedonia, assuredly gathering that the Lord had called us for to preach the gospel unto them.

verses.name: Acts 16:11
verses.text: Therefore loosing from Troas, we came with a straight course to Samothracia, and the next day to Neapolis;

verses.name: Acts 16:12
verses.text: And from thence to Philippi, which is the chief city of that part of Macedonia, and a colony: and we were in that city abiding certain days.
